entry.p: Add new section 1.102–3.
Redesignate sections 1.102–3 and 1.102–4 as sections 1.102–4 and 1.102–5.
In section 1.106, amend the table by adding an entry for “52.201–1” in numerical order.
Amend section 1.108 by removing from paragraph (b) “1.102–4(b)” and adding “1.102–5(b)” in its place.
Amend section 12.301 by—
b. Adding a new paragraph (e)(1).
Amend section 26.206 by removing from paragraph (a) “12.301(e)(4)” and adding “12.301(e)(5)” in its place.
Add section 52.201–1.
Amend section 2.101, in paragraph (b)(2), in the definition of “Small disadvantaged business concern” by—
a. Removing from the introductory text “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place; and
b. Removing from paragraph (1)(ii) “$750,000” and adding “the threshold at 13 CFR 124.104(c)(2)” in its place.
Amend section 9.203 by revising paragraphs (b), (c)(2), and (d).
Amend section 11.102 by—

a. Removing from the first sentence “DoD 4120.24–M, Defense Standardization Program Policies and Procedures” and adding “DoD Manual 4120.24, Defense Standardization Program (DSP) Procedures” in its place; and

b. Removing from the third sentence “DoD 4120.24–M” and “see 11.201(d)(2) or (3)” and adding “DoD Manual 4120.24” and “ https://www.esd.whs.mil/​Directives/​Issuances/​dodm or see 11.201(d)(2) or (3)” in their places, respectively.
Amend section 11.201 by—

a. Removing from paragraph (a) introductory text “the DoD Acquisition Streamlining and Standardization Information System (ASSIST), or other” and adding “available on the DoD Acquisition Streamlining and Standardization Information System (ASSIST) website, or listed in other” in its place;
b. Revising paragraphs (d)(1) through (3); and
c. Removing from paragraph (e) “DoDSSP” and adding “the Defense Standardization Program Office” in its place.
Amend section 11.202 by—
a. Removing from paragraph (a) “listed in the DoDISS” and adding “available at the ASSIST website” in its place; and
b. Removing from paragraph (b) “DoD 4120.24–M, Defense Standardization Program Policies and Procedures” and adding “DoD Manual 4120.24, Defense Standardization Program (DSP) Procedures” in its place.
Amend section 11.204 by revising the section heading and paragraph (b).
Amend section 19.301–1 by removing from the third sentence of paragraph (h) the phrase “ 13 CFR 124.1004 for small disadvantaged business, 13 CFR 125.29” and adding “13 CFR 128.600” in its place.
Amend section 19.304 by removing from paragraph (c) “ 13 CFR 124.1001(b)” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place.
Amend section 19.305 by revising the section heading, introductory text, and paragraph (c).
Amend section 19.703 by—
a. Removing from paragraph (a)(2)(iv) “ 13 CFR 121.411, 124.1015, 125.29, 126.900, and 127.700” and adding “13 CFR 121.411, 126.900, 127.700, and 128.600” in its place; and
b. Removing paragraph (e).
Amend section 23.704 by removing from paragraph (b)(1)(ii) “Pub. L.” and “(see 11.102)(c))” and adding “Public Law” and “(see 11.101(b))” in their places, respectively.
Revise section 52.211–1.
Revise section 52.211–2.
Amend section 52.212–1 by revising the date of the provision and paragraphs (i)(1), (2), and (3).
Amend section 52.212–3 by—
a. Revising the date of the provision; and
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition of “Small disadvantaged business concern” by—
i. Removing from the introductory text “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place; and
ii. Removing from paragraph (1)(ii) “$750,000” and adding “the threshold at 13 CFR 124.104(c)(2)” in its place.
Amend section 52.212–3 by—
a. Revising the date of the provision; and
b. Removing from paragraph (g)(4)(i) “paragraph (g)(5)(ii)” and adding “paragraph (g)(4)(ii)” in its place.
Amend section 52.212–5 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause;
f. Removing from paragraph (e)(1)(vi) “(OCT 2022)” and adding “(Sep 2023)” in its place; and
g. In Alternate II by—
i. Revising the date of the Alternate; and
ii. Removing from paragraph (e)(1)(ii)(F) “(OCT 2022)” and adding “(Sep 2023)” in its place.
Amend section 52.213–4 by: a. Revising the date of the clause; and
b. Removing from paragraph (a)(2)(vii) “(JUN 2023)” and adding “(Sep 2023)” in its place.
Amend section 52.219–1 by—
a. Revising the date of the provision;
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition of “Small disadvantaged business concern” by—
i. Removing from the introductory text “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place; and
ii. Removing from paragraph (1)(ii) “$750,000” and adding “the threshold at 13 CFR 124.104(c)(2)” in its place; and
c. Removing from paragraph (c)(2) “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place.
Amend section 52.219–8 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause;
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition of “Small disadvantaged business concern” by—
i. Removing from the introductory text “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place; and
ii. Removing from paragraph (1)(ii) “$750,000” and adding “the threshold at 13 CFR 124.104(c)(2)” in its place; and
Amend section 52.219–9 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause;
b. Removing from paragraph (c)(2)(iv) “ 13 CFR 121.411, 124.1015, 125.29, 126.900, and 127.700” and adding “13 CFR 121.411, 126.900, 127.700, and 128.600” in its place; and
c. In Alternate IV by—
i. Revising the date of the alternate; and
Amend section 52.219–28 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause; and
b. Removing from paragraph (h)(2) “ 13 CFR 124.1002” and adding “13 CFR 124.1001” in its place.
Amend section 52.244–6 by:
a. Revising the date of the clause; and
b. Removing from paragraph (c)(1)(viii) “(OCT 2022)” and adding “(Sep 2023)” in its place.
Amend section 53.235 by removing “35.010” and adding “35.010 and ANSI Standard Z39.18” in its place.
